entry.title: A Kryptonian and His Gladiator
entry.summary:
Author: Eyeslikedawn

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,597Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 135

Summary: Kryptonian society on the conquered planet Earth is complicated to say the least. When Lord Kal-El's house-guard is slain he decides to rebuild his ranks by purchasing a prized gladiator from Gotham City. His name is Bruce Wayne but the fans of the arena know him as Batman. Regardless of what they call him, though, with the human's stoic demeanor, and grim attitude, Kal has certainly bought more than he bargained for.

entry.title: Haunted by the Ghost of You
entry.summary:
Author: katelaswellswife

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,042Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 21

Summary: Instead of either of them saying anything else, their lips met in the middle. Coming together like two puzzle pieces that finally found each other again. It's different from their other kisses; it feels like the sea meeting the sand. Thomas gently cups her face and pulls her closer as if they could crawl into each other’s skin and live there. Thomas Wayne is going to marry this woman. 10 year old him was right. “Do you want to stay the night?” He was just about to take back the proposal, but before he could, she gave him one of those smiles, the ones he knows are only meant for him, and she nodded. Or; Bruce Wayne knows the story of how his parents fell in love, Thomas would recount it every family dinner. What he doesn’t know is his parents’ love story can only be rivalled by his own …

entry.title: Spiders and Bats Come From the Dark
entry.summary:
Author: Zoveezz

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,552Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 36

Summary: Two years after being erased by the spell, twenty-one-year-old Peter Parker is pulled out of nowhere into another universe, Gotham. Now he has to find a way back to his own, no matter the cost. After a while, he thinks that maybe with the help of these bats he can get back home. ¿Why does he keep feeling like he's already there? ¿And why does Jason keep showing up at his mechanic job on his broken motorcycle? (I'm going to do this work in Spanish too, a couple of hours difference between the upload of the same chapter in another work) ------- At twenty, Jason became Red Hood; now, at twenty-two, he still is. He no longer gets along badly with his stupid vigilante family, but he's not comfortable neither. Maybe because that feeling of loneliness, of isolation, is always there, with the rage. He's stressed out with a difficult case when he meets Peter, whom, for some reason, Jason can't stop staring at. And then there was that idiot Spider-Man who was hanging around in his neighborhood.

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 166,737Chapters: 32/?Kudos: 313

Summary: “Oh, you do like to flirt, don’t you?” Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entrée: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn’t help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. “Flirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‘Everything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power’. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you’ve got the whole world in your hands.” After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can’t escape.

entry.title: Blinding Truth
entry.summary:
Author: Holdt

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,452Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 5

Summary: When Bruce Wayne's parents are assassinated for his reform proposals, his uncontrolled spirit-magic nearly kills him. Death-servant Clark abandons his sacred duty to save Bruce's life—condemning a spirit to shadow-eternity and losing his own sight in a failed purification ritual. Now forsaken by his people and able to see only magic and mortality, Clark must keep Bruce's wild power from burning him out while wetlands warriors train them both for revolution. Bruce will return to Gotham to destroy the old guard families who murdered his parents. But first, he has to be worth everything Clark sacrificed.

Author: TheBobblehat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 55,051Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 220

Summary: For the past five hundred years, Krypton has successfully spearheaded the colonization and reeducation of twenty six alien planets. Lorded over by the Royal House of El, Krypton's forces have just declared victory over their 27th conquest. The planet X9Y-BH91, otherwise known as "Earth." As a representative for the planet, and potentially a candidate for the new world order, the Earthling Lex Luthor has come to Krypton with a peace offering; a small selection of humans as gifts. One in particular is promised to the oldest son of the House of El, Kal. But Kal-El's pet is not docile, not subservient, not obedient. And for a prince considered soft to the touch, Kal's pet proves to be one hell of a problem. As for Bruce Wayne, a man who has lost everything--his children, his wealth, his home--no measure is too drastic to escape the planet Krypton. When sheer force does not work, Bruce decides he can seduce his master into a false sense of security before killing him in his sleep and jumping ship back to Earth. A fool proof plan. Or at least, it would have been... had he not fallen in love with Kal-El in the process.
